kjv_def: beat into, cast (up-)on, fall, lay (on), put (unto), stretch forth, think on
strongs_def: to throw upon (literal or figurative, transitive or reflexive; usually with more or less force); specially (with G1438 (ἐπιβάλλω) implied) to reflect; impersonally, to belong to
outline:
1. to cast upon, to lay upon
    1. used of seizing one to lead him off as a prisoner
    2. to put (i.e. sew) on
  2. to throw one's self upon, rush in
    1. used of waves rushing into a ship
    2. to put one's mind upon a thing
    3. attend to
  3. it belongs to me, falls to my share
